data.title: Aishwarya Rai, Abhishek Bachchan Seen Sitting Together At Ambani Wedding After Posing Separately. Watch Viral Video
meta_keywords: abhishek aishwarya together video ambani wedding
data.meta_description: Abhishek Bachchan and Aishwarya Rai Bachchan posed separately at Anant Ambani and Radhika Merchant‚Äôs wedding sparking separation rumours. Another video of the wedding shows the couple sitting together.
data.text:
Abhishek Bachchan and Aishwarya Rai Bachchan posed separately at Anant Ambani and Radhika Merchant‚Äôs wedding sparking separation rumours. Now another video is doing the rounds on the internet where the couple is seen sitting together along with their daughter Aaradhya, during the wedding rituals of Anant and Radhika.

Abhishek and Aishwarya sitting together at the Ambani wedding

The video shows Abhishek and Aishwarya engaged in a fun conversation with Hrithik Roshan, while Aaradhya sits beside Aishwarya. Take a look at the viral video:

Abhishek and Aishwarya posed separately at the Ambani wedding

Abhishek Bacchan arrived at the wedding with the entire Bachchan clan except for Aishwarya and Aaradhya. Abhishek posed with his parents Amitabh Bachchan, Jaya, sister Shweta Bachchan and her husband Nikhil Nanda, and children, Navya Naveli Nanda and Agastya Nanda.

Aishwarya Rai, on the other hand, came to the wedding later with her daughter Aaradhya and posed with her. She was also seen greeting yesteryear actor Rekha.

Netizens react

As soon as the videos of the couple posing separately were out, eagle-eyed fans jumped to the conclusion that both of them have separated, fans even pointed fingers at Abhishek. A user wrote, "Manchild Abhishek. He left his world famous wife and only daughter to be with his mum n married sister. Shame on this desi parenting where parents expect their grown up children to choose the family you came from over the family you created. Dysfunctional Bachchan family with over posessive parents and their underdeveloped, dependent grown up children.‚Äù

Another wrote, "They lost the Real Diamond üíé= Aishwarya ‚ù§Ô∏è".

Anant Ambani and Radhika Merchant tied the knot in Mumbai on July 12, with guests from across the globe attending the wedding.
